content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you needing help with plumbing, electrical, or heating & cooling?
Hi, yeah it’s my AC. It’s not working well.
I’m sorry your AC isn’t working well. May I have your name so I can help you get scheduled for HVAC service?
It’s Frank. But, actually, I think I’m going to try fixing it myself first. I’ll call back if I need someone.
No problem, Frank. If you need any help in the future with your AC or other home services, just let us know. Good luck with your repair!
reason: Customer decided to try fixing it themselves.
